about_the_game:
The Story Begins

Awakened by strange sounds in the dead of night, you quickly realize something is horribly wrong. The house feels unfamiliar, shrouded in shadows and dread. The door is locked tight, leaving you no choice but to explore the unsettling rooms to find a way out. As you search, the house's secrets begin to reveal themselves, and the line between safety and terror blurs with every step.

🔑 Solve Puzzles to Survive
Uncover hidden keys, clues, and solve intricate puzzles scattered throughout the house. Each challenge brings you closer to escape, but nothing is as simple as it seems.

🌑 Immersive Horror Atmosphere
Feel the creeping dread as you navigate through darkness, eerie silence, and unsettling environments designed to keep you on edge.

👻 Something Lurks in the Shadows
You're not alone. Something is watching... and waiting. Stay alert because danger could strike when you least expect it.

🧩 Unique Challenges
A seamless blend of escape-room-style puzzles and survival horror gameplay. Prepare yourself for tension, panic, and perfectly timed jump scares that will test your courage.

🎮 Realistic Experience
With carefully crafted visuals and immersive sound design, October's Curse pulls you into a chillingly realistic nightmare. Every creak, shadow, and whisper is designed to heighten the fear.

Warning:

This game contains frightening visuals, loud sounds, and jump scares that may not be suitable for players under the age of 15 or those sensitive to horror content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950 / AMD Radeon equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 or AMD equivalent (AMD FX 9500+ Series)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon equivalent
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: October is here, and with it comes the whispers of old tales. Strange things happen when the leaves turn red and the nights grow cold. Solve challenging puzzles to unravel the truth about what October hides. Be warned—some mysteries are meant to stay buried.
